title: 820-00045 Totally wacked out display.
message:
WOW this one is cool.

Watch the video: [URL]https://youtu.be/ukg3oQGpFM0[/URL]

Machine never boots just dances. Now it does not even display that. Just black screen.

Door #1   CPU problem.
Door #2   Apple is joining the hipsters.

title: 820-00045 Totally wacked out display.
message: Dead CPU just like every other 12" lol.
